body_html:
Regarding 3. in your #15271 (comment)

The global_step is currently updated non-deterministically so it can happen that while it still runs training the global step already gets updated (not tested for loss calculation but happens for tf.cond(global_step,...) in generator_fn). Maybe global_step_inc should depend on the loss with tf.control_dependencies?

body:
Regarding 3. in your https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/15271#issuecomment-350702852

The `global_step` is currently updated non-deterministically so it can happen that while it still runs training the global step already gets updated (not tested for loss calculation but happens for `tf.cond(global_step,...)` in `generator_fn`). Maybe `global_step_inc` should depend on the loss with ` tf.control_dependencies `?
